name: 3dWarpDrive
author: AFNI Team
description: Warp a dataset to match another one (the base) using an affine transformation.

inputs.description: Input dataset
inputs.name: Input dataset

inputs.description: Load dataset as the base to which the input dataset will be matched. This is a mandatory option.
inputs.name: Base dataset

inputs.description: Sets the prefix of the output dataset. If 'NULL', no output dataset is written.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: 3 parameters (shifts)
inputs.name: Shift Only

inputs.description: 6 parameters (shifts + angles)
inputs.name: Shift and Rotate

inputs.description: 9 parameters (shifts + angles + scale factors)
inputs.name: Shift, Rotate, and Scale

inputs.description: 12 parameters (3 shifts + 3x3 matrix)
inputs.name: Affine General

inputs.description: 39 parameters (3 + 3x3 + 3x3x3). Not implemented and will never be.
inputs.name: Bilinear General

inputs.description: Linear interpolation method
inputs.name: Linear interpolation

inputs.description: Cubic interpolation method
inputs.name: Cubic interpolation

inputs.description: Nearest neighbor interpolation method [default]
inputs.name: Nearest Neighbor interpolation

inputs.description: Quintic interpolation method
inputs.name: Quintic interpolation

inputs.description: Specify the input dataset anywhere in the command line option list.
inputs.name: Input dataset (alternative option)

inputs.description: Print out lots of information along the way.
inputs.name: Verbose Flag

inputs.description: Save summary of calculations into text file. If value is '-', summary goes to stdout.
inputs.name: Summary file

inputs.description: Allow up to 'm' iterations for convergence.
inputs.name: Max Iterations

inputs.description: Distance, in voxel size, used to compute image derivatives using finite differences. [Default=1.0]
inputs.name: Delta for Finite Differences

inputs.description: Set the weighting applied to each voxel proportional to the brick specified here. [Default=computed by program from base]
inputs.name: Weight Dataset

inputs.description: Set the convergence parameter to be RMS 't' voxels movement between iterations. [Default=0.03]
inputs.name: Convergence Threshold

inputs.description: Do the parameter estimation in two passes, coarse-but-fast first, then fine-but-slow second.
inputs.name: Two-Pass Estimation

inputs.description: Set the final warp to be interpolated using 'mode'.
inputs.name: Final Interpolation Mode

inputs.description: Fix the n'th parameter of the warp model to the value 'v'. More than one -parfix option can be used.
inputs.name: Fix Parameters

inputs.description: Write out the warping parameters to this file.
inputs.name: Warping Parameters File

inputs.description: Write output dataset in float format, even if input dataset is short or byte.
inputs.name: Float Format Output

inputs.description: Initialize shift+rotation parameters by a brute force coarse search.
inputs.name: Coarse Rotation Initialization

inputs.description: Save base-to-input transformation matrices in specified file. If the file does not end in '.1D', the program will append '.aff12.1D'.
inputs.name: Transformation Matrices File

inputs.description: Set the order of the matrix multiplication for the affine transformations (S=triangular shear, D=diagonal scaling matrix, U=rotation matrix).
inputs.name: Matrix Order SDU

inputs.description: Set the order of the matrix multiplication for the affine transformations (S=triangular shear, U=rotation matrix, D=diagonal scaling matrix).
inputs.name: Matrix Order SUD

inputs.description: Set the order of the matrix multiplication for the affine transformations (D=diagonal scaling matrix, S=triangular shear, U=rotation matrix).
inputs.name: Matrix Order DSU

inputs.description: Set the order of the matrix multiplication for the affine transformations (D=diagonal scaling matrix, U=rotation matrix, S=triangular shear).
inputs.name: Matrix Order DUS

inputs.description: Set the order of the matrix multiplication for the affine transformations (U=rotation matrix, S=triangular shear, D=diagonal scaling matrix).
inputs.name: Matrix Order USD

inputs.description: Set the order of the matrix multiplication for the affine transformations (U=rotation matrix, D=diagonal scaling matrix, S=triangular shear).
inputs.name: Matrix Order UDS

inputs.description: Set the S matrix to be upper triangular.
inputs.name: Upper Triangular S Matrix

inputs.description: Set the S matrix to be lower triangular.
inputs.name: Lower Triangular S Matrix

inputs.description: Apply the shift parameters after the matrix transformation.
inputs.name: Shift After Transformation

inputs.description: Apply the shift parameters before the matrix transformation.
inputs.name: Shift Before Transformation
